job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field

jd: From: Sonam Gupta, Sonitalent sonam.gupta@sonitalentcorp.com Reply to: sonam.gupta@sonitalentcorp.com Hi,Please have a look at the description below.Job Title:- Full Stack Engineer .NETLocation:- 100% Remote (Only EST or CST)Job Description:-Full Stack Engineer .NETWe are seeking a hands-on Full Stack Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in .NET, C#, and React. Responsibilities:Design, develop, and maintain scalable, high-performance applications using .NET, C#, and React.Design and implementation of new features and products.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement new features.Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends.Plan and execute data migration projects, ensuring data integrity and minimal downtime. Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.·5+ years of experience in software development.Proficiency in .NET framework and C# programming.Experience with React and modern front-end development practices.Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.Strong communication and leadership abilities. Preferred Skills:Experience with Azure Cloud services and DevOps practices.Knowledge of AI and machine learning concepts and their practical applications in business.Proven experience in planning and executing complex data migration projects.
